news_header: Internet Initiative Japan Inc. reported increased profit and revenues for the first nine months of fiscal 2024.
news_original_title: Internet Initiative Japan 9-month Profit, Revenues Rise; Confirms FY24 Outlook
news_text: Internet Initiative Japan Inc. (IIJIY) announced a 6.2% rise in net profit to 13.79 billion yen and a 14% increase in total revenues to 229.31 billion yen for the first nine months of fiscal 2024. The company maintained its fiscal outlook, expecting a net profit of 20.6 billion yen and total revenues of 312.0 billion yen for the full year.
